messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: PHILADELPHIA POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION BRANCH
Special Victims Unit
SIGNAL: 84S
ITEM NUMBER: S-84089-32
PAGE 41 of 82
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Thomas Brown
Sgt. Emily White
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Richard Green
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. David Lee
Sgt. Jessica Hall
( Domestic Violence Unit)
Det. Michael Thompson
Det. Sarah Clark
( Domestic Violence Unit)
Det. Kevin Wilson
( Domestic Violence Unit)
Det. Laura Martinez
Det. James Roberts
(General Assignment)
Det. Rachel Adams
(Sexual Assault Unit)
Det. Brian Lopez
(Child Protection Unit)
VICTIM:
JANE DOE, female, age 16, high school student.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
22 NOVEMBER 2032 at around 7:00 PM in the Northern Liberties neighborhood.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Richard Green
5438
In the investigation, a complex web of witness accounts and limited physical evidence presented challenges. Officer Johnson, patrolling Northern Liberties, was the first to respond to the distress call. He was aided by Sgt. David Lee and Patrol Officer Smith, who implemented immediate safety measures. Technician Parker, an expert in forensic psychology, was brought in to provide victim support. Criminalist Davis, examining the limited evidence, identified key items that shed light on the suspect's profile. Coroner Dr. Anderson was consulted to examine an unrelated case in the vicinity, leading to unforeseen insights into the special victims case. Patrol Officer Murphy, interacting with local youth groups, gathered testimonies that significantly contributed to the investigation.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Thomas Brown Officer Context: Supervised the case in the Special Victims Unit. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Emily White Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Brown. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Richard Green Officer Context: Lead investigator for the special victims case, reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. David Lee Officer Context: Assisted at the scene, part of the Domestic Violence Unit. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Jessica Hall Officer Context: Domestic Violence Unit sergeant, supported the operation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Michael Thompson Officer Context: Domestic Violence Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Sarah Clark Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the Domestic Violence Unit. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Kevin Wilson Officer Context: Domestic Violence Unit detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Laura Martinez Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. James Roberts Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the special victims case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Rachel Adams Officer Context: Sexual Assault Unit detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Brian Lopez Officer Context: Child Protection Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Johnson Officer Context: First responder to the distress call in Northern Liberties. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Smith Officer Context: Assisted in implementing immediate safety measures. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Parker Officer Context: Forensic psychology expert, provided victim support. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Davis Officer Context: Analyzed limited evidence, identified key items linked to the suspect. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Anderson Officer Context: Examined an unrelated case, provided insights into the special victims case. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Murphy Officer Context: Gathered testimonies from local youth groups, aiding the investigation. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
